pr_title: Phenotype Enum Standardization and Fully Implementing Vehicle, ProtoMech, and Naval Phenotypes

timeline.message: Continuing to implement bloodname and phenotype changes
Finishing implementing Phenotype and Bloodname changes
Fixing selected faction not working properly

timeline.bodyText: Let's leave this here. It is extremely useful for debugging, or if you want to generate some specific units.
timeline.author: NickAragua
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -1301,66 +1318,6 @@ public static Entity createEntityWithCrew(String faction, int skill, Campaign ca
         return en;
     }
 
-    /**
-     * Generates a new Entity without using a RAT. Useful for "persistent" or fixed units.
-     *
-     * @param name            Full name (chassis + model) of the entity to generate.
-     * @param fName            Faction code to use for crew name generation
-     * @param skill            RandomSkillsGenerator.L_* constant for the average force skill level.
-     * @param campaign
-     * @return                A new Entity
-     */
-    @Deprecated //Deprecated 15-Feb-2020 as unused, needs the current name system to be implemented if activated
-    private static Entity getEntityByName(String name, String fName, int skill, Campaign campaign) {

replies.bodyText: This will need to be modified then, as it doesn't work properly as it is currently because of personnel changes, and has not since February. If you want me to I can restore it and fix it?
replies.author: Windchild292

replies.bodyText: Refactored it down so that it just uses the createEntityWithCrew but first grabs the MechSummary. This keeps the current behaviour while being less code.
replies.author: Windchild292

timeline.bodyText: Let's go through this file and put some documentation on the methods.
timeline.author: NickAragua

replies.bodyText: At the very least the public ones.
replies.author: NickAragua

timeline.bodyText: I wonder if anyone actually has saves from before 3.4. I would suggest moving this out into a separate method.
timeline.author: NickAragua

replies.bodyText: Next part of my person changes following this and genealogy is going to be reworking the xml read/write into a simpler format. This will be part of doing so.
replies.author: Windchild292

timeline.bodyText: Forgot to add to this: Should there be bonuses here for the other phenotypes?
timeline.author: Windchild292

replies.bodyText: I'm not familiar with the rules for it, so I can't say one way or the other. Shouldn't be too hard to implement if that's the case, though.
replies.author: NickAragua

timeline.message: Readding and reworking getEntityByName as per review
